observation.output:
=== Debugging WCS behavior ===
1. Testing simple WCS (no coupling)...
Simple WCS result: (array(49.5), array(11.5), array(1.90909091e+11))
Simple sliced result: (array(49.5), array(11.5))

2. Testing coupled WCS (from issue)...
Coupled WCS result: (array(1.90909091e+11), array(11.5), array(1.90909091e+11))
Coupled sliced result: (array(49.5), array(11.5))

3. Analysis:
Simple WCS:
  Unsliced: (array(49.5), array(11.5), array(1.90909091e+11))
  Sliced:   (array(49.5), array(11.5))
  Match: True
Coupled WCS:
  Unsliced: (array(1.90909091e+11), array(11.5), array(1.90909091e+11))
  Sliced:   (array(49.5), array(11.5))
  Match: False

Astropy version: 7.1.0

4. Testing what the correct world coordinate should be...
Pixel [49.5, 12.0, 0.0] -> World (array(359.99930556), array(3.50822708e-15), array(1.05e-10))
Using correct world coord 1.0500000000000001e-10: (array(49.5), array(11.5), array(0.))
